display_title.display_title:
Tanzania - Sixth Power Project :
            Eligibilty Report

repnme.cdata!: Tanzania - Sixth Power Project : Eligibilty Report

abstracts.cdata!:
The Eligibility Report for the Power VI
            Project in Tanzania outlines the Request for Inspection and
            provides recommendations based on the Inspection
            Panel's investigation. The Request, filed by a group
            from a Tanzanian company, Tannol Holdings, LTC., claimed
            that restructuring of the loan for the Power VI Project was
            not necessary as private funding was available and was not
            considered by the Management.  The Requesters state that the
            International Development Association (IDA) did not follow
            policies and procedures and improperly influenced the
            Tanzanian Government's decision in regards to funding
            for the project. The Requesters also claim that the
            Bank's environmental policies were violated in
            preparation for the project. After reviewing the Request,
            the Panel is satisfied that Management has followed the
            required policies and procedures in regards to environmental
            assessment. The Panel concluded that an investigation into
            the violations of the IDA policies is not recommended.
